body: I expected the worse from this author, What a relatively tame story, best girl Anna, and I didn't expect this at all but, Hiragi and Yuki, Yuki's remaining journey with her, and how they became a couple, It's one of those scenarios that I'm dying to see a slice of life type of story with them, Will never happen but it still made me wanted it
